item.title: LanguageLearning Subreddit Survey Exploratory Analysis
item.description: Welcome to this analysis of the /r/languagelearning subreddit survey data. Before I begin I should mention a bit about myself. In addition to my role as the moderator of the /r/languagelearning subreddit on reddit, I am also the author of the ebook How to Teach Yourself a Foreign Language, which is available for free on my website. I am also a data analyst in my real life. This post is intended to help give people an overview of the survey data, as well as show anyone interested how they can do so using Python.
